extendedInfo.description: We are one of the largest practices in the Midwest, with a complete system to help ensure you can see well for life. From simple eye exams to complex surgery using the very latest technology, it's all here: ophthalmologists, optometrists and opticians-all under one roof-and ready to serve you.In fact, we've been serving the Metro East and Southern Illinois for more than 30 years. Today, we have more than 15 locations throughout Southern Illinois. Our practice is owned and operated by Medical Doctor Ophthalmologists who live in Illinois. And, we're dedicated to leading the way with the latest advancements for helping people see clearly. For example, we were the first in the area with micro incision, no stitch cataract surgery and laser vision correction. And we continue to lead the way, being the first in the St. Louis Metro Area with LenSx, laser assisted cataract surgery, and the FS 200/Wavelight laser for advanced bladeless Lasik.Illinois Eye Surgeons is also proud to be the Preferred Eyecare Providers for SIUE Cougar Athletics and the Gateway Grizzlies.
